article_title: Former Japan Premier Koizumi Criticizes Nuclear Push
article_text:
TOKYO—Junichiro Koizumi, a former prime minister and onetime nuclear power supporter, is questioning a push by his former protégé and the current premier, Shinzo Abe, to restart Japan's nuclear facilities.

On Tuesday, Mr. Koizumi held his first news conference since retiring from politics in 2008, potentially reopening the energy debate that appeared to have all but disappeared since Mr. Abe's landslide electoral victories brought...
